page.title: 20SPORTS FIELD
page.content:
This field off St Germans Road, (400m N.E. of Coombe Farm) belongs to Cornwall County Council but has been converted into a{cricket ground}by the expanding{Callington Club. }To house the newly formed 3rd team in 1984, a {square}was levelled and grassed, new {changing rooms}and a{scorebox}were built, and a{caravan}was installed to serve teas. The 1985 season was very successful for Callington 3rd team :-
{LEAGUE RECORD: WON 14 LOST 3 {ABANDONED 1. This made the team champions of Cornwall Junior 4 East League with 280 points. {FRIENDLIES: WON 3 LOST 4 { ABANDONDED 1 The sports field is also used for {junior football}in the Winter months.
